name: Dice Paper Scissors!
description:
Untouched for millennia, Rock Paper Scissors (or Roshambo in some parts of the world) is one of the oldest games in history. No one has ever found a way to improve it.

Until now! Mastered Rock Paper Scissors? Then try Dice Paper Scissors! Like Rock Paper Scissors, with dice!

Your rock, paper and scissors get assigned a strength by a roll of a dice, and each round you have to play 3 games at once, with each game worth different amounts of points! Do you play your strongest weapon to the highest points, or do you bluff and try and counter an opponents offensive?

Play against a state of the art CPU, with 1 difficulty level that sort of adapts to how you play!

Try it today for free in your browser.

Music by @gruber_music and @krajzeg (Pico-8 Tunes Volume 1 (lexaloffle.com))

SFX by @gruber_music (Pico-8 SFX Pack! (lexaloffle.com))

Known Bugs:

You can softlock the game if you press 2 buttons on one frame. Please only press one button at a time.
